name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 59: The Air Bud Rule

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this weeks show, we talk about giving gifts to coworkers, what to do when your best friend loves someone else more, and destroying your gross roommate’s gross shit. Stay gold, XOXO We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
